objects.text:
• Classic Leather Design
• 2-Inch Platform Style
• High Cushioned Midsole
• Abrasion Resistant Outsole

product_details.name: Strathwood Basics Adirondack Ottoman
product_details.description: The Club C Double Revenge women's sneakers take the Reebok classic style you love and adds a trendy 2 inch platform to give you extra height and on-trend fashion. Not your basic white leather sneakers, they have cool Reebok logos, tonal leather overlays, and a modern, chunky style. Perforated details make them breathable, and terry padding on the tongue and collar make them easy to wear all day. The high abrasion resistant rubber outsole ensures stability on the court, while the ultra high cushioned midsole keeps you standing tall. Cute sneakers have never been so comfortable! If you're looking for the best pair of womens platform tennis shoes, you've found them. Available in women shoes size 5-11. Categories: white platform sneakers for women, zapatos de plataforma para mujer.

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek, modern layout with a bold footwear advertisement. The background is divided into four quadrants with varying monochrome shades and a grid overlay, providing visual structure. The product image is rotated and positioned prominently across the center-right. The main headline, represented by `heading_1` and `heading_2`, uses bold white typography for emphasis, while `tagline` appears in a sharp red futuristic font below. The key features listed under `description` are neatly aligned in bullet format. A bold price element (`price`) stands out at the bottom left. The red call-to-action button (`cta_background` + `cta`) anchors the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black (#000000)
- Dark Gray (#222222)
- Light Gray (#E0E0E0)
- Soft Gray (#D0D0D0)
- Highlight Red (#E63946)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a stylish Reebok sneaker that balances monochrome aesthetics with subtle highlights. The primary color palette includes deep black (#1E1E1E), creamy off-white (#F2EFE9), and light gray (#D9D9D9) used in the sole and accents. Black dominates the upper portion, making the off-white elements like the side stripes and laces pop with clean contrast. These colors blend through smooth transitions, avoiding harsh separations, while the red (#D0162A) and navy blue (#1A2D66) in the Reebok logo add a small but effective burst of vibrancy. For an advertisement banner, a minimalist palette using these tones ensures modern, bold visual impact.
